doc.previous: Privatisation of state corporations like the defunct Kenya Post and Telecommunications Company which resulted in East Africa s most profitable company Safaricom has led to their revival because of massive private investment
doc.after: As of May 2011 economic prospects are positive with 4 5 GDP growth expected largely because of expansions in tourism telecommunications transport construction and a recovery in agriculture The World Bank estimated growth of 4 3 in 2012 79
